ovdesc.p: This screen is used to indicate to the payments hub whether manual authorization is required by COA officer in order to process the payment order.
Basic Configuration are based on the characteristics of the payment order such as

Manual authorization required is set to Y for the particular payment order characteristics then manual authorization request for the particular payment can be requested to the system even if the debit account does not have the required balance.

Manual authorization required is not set to N for the particular payment order characteristics then manual authorization request cannot be requested to the system even if the debit account does not have the required balance.

Manual authorization required table is not defined at all the system will consider the default value as Y and manual authorization request for the particular payment order can be requested to the system.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.MANUALAUTHOREQUIRED.

desc.p: Specifies if manual authorization is required for the payment based on the defined characteristics in this table.
"Y" - Yes. Implies that the Manual Authorization can be requested for the payment order if required.
"N" - No. Implies that the Manual Authorization cannot be requested for the payment order.
